participant_1.background:
I'm proud of my dedication to animal welfare and my ability to make the world a better place for animals.
i work as an accountant.
I don't feel like I can be myself around my boss because we're dating.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm excited for the weekend, I'm going to visit my dad.
That sounds great! How long have you been dating your boss?
We've been together for about a year, we met at work.
Oh that's nice! Do you ever feel like you can't be yourself around him because you're dating your boss?
Sometimes, but I try to just be myself and not worry about it too much.

I'm glad you're able to be yourself around him! I'm an accountant too, I'm actually really passionate about animal welfare, but I don't always feel like I can be myself around my colleagues because I'm not sure how they feel about it.
That's too bad! I think it's important to be able to be yourself around the people you work with, even if you don't always agree with them.
I agree! I'm actually working on a project right now to help animals in need, I'm really excited about it!
That's great! I'm sure it will be a lot of work, but I'm sure it will be worth it in the end.
